unnormalised: A fire broke out at approximately 3:15 PM on Tuesday at a residential building located at 12, Krishna Apartments, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050. Initial reports suggest the fire originated on the 7th floor.
normalised: A fire broke out at approximately three fifteen P-M on Tuesday at a residential building located at twelve, Krishna Apartments, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty. Initial reports suggest the fire originated on the seventh floor.

unnormalised: Residents from nearby flats, including Flat No. 8B and Unit 14C, were quickly evacuated as a precautionary measure. Firefighters arrived within minutes, navigating the narrow lanes leading to the building on L.B.S. Marg. The buildingâ€™s address, often written as Krishna Apartments, Bandra (W), was initially miscommunicated, causing a slight delay.
normalised: Residents from nearby flats, including Flat Number eight B and Unit fourteen C, were quickly evacuated as a precautionary measure. Firefighters arrived within minutes, navigating the narrow lanes leading to the building on L-B-S Marg. The building's address, often written as Krishna Apartments, Bandra West, was initially miscommunicated, causing a slight delay.

unnormalised: Eyewitnesses reported thick smoke billowing from the windows of Apt # 701. One resident, identified as Mrs. Sharma from Flat 6A, mentioned hearing a small explosion before the fire alarms went off.
normalised: Eyewitnesses reported thick smoke billowing from the windows of Apartment hash seven zero one. One resident, identified as Missus Sharma from Flat six A, mentioned hearing a small explosion before the fire alarms went off.

unnormalised: As of 6:00 PM, the fire has been brought under control. Authorities are currently investigating the cause. Residents are advised to contact the building management, located at the ground floor office, or the local police station at Juhu Tara Road, for updates.
normalised: As of six P-M, the fire has been brought under control. Authorities are currently investigating the cause. Residents are advised to contact the building management, located at the ground floor office, or the local police station at Juhu Tara Road, for updates.
